Interface IBookingController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingController
public interface IBookingController
Interface defining the contract for managing flat bookings for BTO housing projects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createBooking(FlatBooking booking)
    Creates a new flat booking in the system.
    boolean
    createBooking(ProjectApplication application, HDBOfficer officer)
    Creates a booking from a project application, processed by a specific HDB officer.

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      boolean createBooking(FlatBooking booking)
      Creates a new flat booking in the system.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to create
      Returns:
      true if the booking was created successfully, false otherwise

    • processBooking

      FlatBooking processBooking(Applicant applicant, Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Processes a booking for an applicant in a specific project for a selected flat type.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant requesting the booking
      project - The project to book a flat in
      flatType - The type of flat to book
      Returns:
      The created FlatBooking if successful, null otherwise

    • createBooking

      boolean createBooking(ProjectApplication application, HDBOfficer officer)
      Creates a booking from a project application, processed by a specific HDB officer.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to create a booking for
      officer - The HDB officer processing the booking
      Returns:
      true if the booking was created successfully, false otherwise

    • rejectBooking

      boolean rejectBooking(ProjectApplication application, String rejectionReason)
      Rejects a booking request for a project application with a specified reason.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to reject
      rejectionReason - The reason for rejecting the booking
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was processed successfully, false otherwise

    • hasApprovedBooking

      boolean hasApprovedBooking(ProjectApplication application)
      Checks if a project application has an approved booking.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to check
      Returns:
      true if the application has an approved booking, false otherwise

    • getBookingStatus

      String getBookingStatus(ProjectApplication application)
      Gets the booking status for a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to get the booking status for
      Returns:
      The booking status, or null if no booking exists

    • getBookingForApplication

      FlatBooking getBookingForApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Gets the booking associated with a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to get the booking for
      Returns:
      The FlatBooking object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllBookings

      List<FlatBooking> getAllBookings()
      Gets a list of all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all FlatBooking objects

    • getPendingBookings

      List<FlatBooking> getPendingBookings()
      Gets a list of all pending bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with pending status

    • getApprovedBookings

      List<FlatBooking> getApprovedBookings()
      Gets a list of all approved bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with approved status

    • getRejectedBookings

      List<FlatBooking> getRejectedBookings()
      Gets a list of all rejected bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with rejected status

    • generateAndStoreReceipt

      Receipt generateAndStoreReceipt(FlatBooking booking)
      Generates and stores a receipt for a booking.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      The generated Receipt object if successful, null otherwise

    • hasReceipt

      boolean hasReceipt(String nric)
      Checks if a receipt exists for an applicant with the specified NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant to check
      Returns:
      true if a receipt exists for the applicant, false otherwise

    • getReceiptForApplicant

      Receipt getReceiptForApplicant(String nric)
      Gets the receipt for an applicant with the specified NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      The Receipt object if found, null otherwise

    • updateFlatAvailability

      boolean updateFlatAvailability(Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Updates the availability of a flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      flatType - The flat type to update availability for
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      boolean generateReceipt(ProjectApplication application)
      Generates a receipt for a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      true if the receipt was generated successfully, false otherwise

    • setBookings

      void setBookings(List<FlatBooking> bookingsList)
      Sets the bookings from a list of FlatBooking objects.
      Parameters:
      bookingsList - The list of bookings to set

    • setReceipts

      void setReceipts(List<Receipt> receiptsList)
      Sets the receipts from a list of Receipt objects.
      Parameters:
      receiptsList - The list of receipts to set

    • getAllReceipts

      List<Receipt> getAllReceipts()
      Gets a list of all receipts in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Receipt objects
